title: Public employers; defined
context: [ยง87A-31.1] Public employers; defined. For the purposes of this part, &ldquo;public employer&rdquo; means a governmental entity whose employees&rsquo;, beneficiaries&rsquo;, and retirees&rsquo; health benefits coverage is provided through the fund. [L 2013, c 268, pt of ยง6]
